txt.en: Speak with Cecil Voller
Now you should wait for the battle to begin
You did not get to the battle-field in time. The next round will begin shortly.
The fight has begun! You may begin hurling snowballs (and hiding)

You have been challenged to best foes in the great snowball-battle on the fields of Frostbluff.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You have taken a victim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
This round has ended. Another will begin soon, and you may resume the battle.
You may begin hurling snow at your foes.
This round has ended; you have run out of time

'Hello there, good patron! Would you like to know how the snowball-fight works? Here are some instructions....

'When the event begins, players who are gathered in the battle-field will be able to pick up snowballs from snow-piles on the ground. 

'The snowball you gather will appear in your inventory. You may then target another player and right-click the snowball to throw it...and then you must gather another!

'In this particular quest, you can join the game as many times as it takes to complete the objectives.'

The snowball battle-field is in the field below Winter-home.

You should begin by entering the battle-field.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: You can only participate in the snowball-fight inside the boundaries of the field.</rgb>
'Well done, [placeholder]! You have quite a knack for this sport. I'll wager there are a lot of cold people around here now, thanks to you.'
You should wait for the fight to begin while waiting inside the battle-field's bounds.

Snowballs can be made from the piles of snow around the battle-field. They appear in your inventory and are destroyed when you throw them at another player.\n\nYou should gather snowballs and attack your competitors.
'The battle-field is here...you just need to walk onto it! If you're ready, that is....'
Cecil Voller awaits you at the edge of the battle-field.\n\nYou should speak with Cecil Voller of your success in the snowball battle.
Enter the snowball battle-field
Wait for the snow-battle event to begin
Gather snowballs and attack your fellow players ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
(Right-click the snowballs you gather to attack selected targets.)
Battle of the Snowballs (Easy)
Talk to Cecil Voller
